name: 1-800-GOT-ZOMBIES?
description:
Hello! Thanks for replying to our ad, you got the job! By now you’ve already been given your company-issued assault rifle and body armour. You are scheduled for a review at the end of the month, should you fail to meet our quota, you will be terminated. Zombie Operations and Undead Services is not responsible for death, infection or psychological trauma. You apply at your own risk.

Music used is from Plants vs. Zombies 3 because I'm very lazy.

Also, I didn't come up with the name, this guy did:  https://www.youtube.com/c/papajake

Let me know if there are any bugs, I will try to fix them as soon as possible.
